\u0421\u0443\u043c\u043c\u0430 \u043d\u0430\u0433\u0440\u0430\u0434\u044b \u0438\u0441\u043f\u043e\u043b\u043d\u0438\u0442\u0435\u043b\u044e\r\n        bool isVerified;          // \u041f\u043e\u0434\u0442\u0432\u0435\u0440\u0436\u0434\u0435\u043d\u0430 \u043b\u0438 \u043f\u043e\u0441\u0430\u0434\u043a\u0430\r\n        uint256 plantedAt;        // \u0412\u0440\u0435\u043c\u044f }\r\n\r\n    // ============ STATE VARIABLES ============\r\n    \r\n    uint256 private _treeIds;\r\n    uint256 private _tokenIds;\r\n    \r\n    // \u041c\u0430\u043f\u043f\u0438\u043d\u0433 ID \u0434\u0435\u0440\u0435\u0432\u0430 \u043a \u0434\u0430\u043d\u043d\u044b\u043c \u0434\u0435\u0440\u0435\u0432\u0430\r\n    mapping(uint256 => Tree) public trees;\r\n    \r\n    // \u041c\u0430\u043f\u043f\u0438\u043d\u0433 \u0430\u0434\u0440\u0435\u0441\u0430 \u0438\u0441\u043f\u043e\u043b\u043d\u0438\u0442\u0435\u043b\u044f \u043a \u043a\u043e\u043b\u0438\u0447\u0435\u0441\u0442\u0432\u0443 \u043f\u043e\u0441\u0430\u0436\u0435\u043d\u043d\u044b\u0445 \u0434\u0435\u0440\u0435\u0432\u044c\u0435\u0432\r\n    mapping(address => uint256) public executorTreeCount;\r\n    \r\n    // \u041c\u0430\u043f\u043f\u0438\u043d\u0433 \u0430\u0434\u0440\u0435\u0441\u0430 \u0434\u043e\u043d\u043e\u0440\u0430 \u043a \u043a\u043e\u043b\u0438\u0447\u0435\u0441\u0442\u0432\u0443 \u043f\u043e\u0436\u0435\u0440\u0442\u0432\u043e\u0432\u0430\u043d\u043d\u044b\u0445 \u0434\u0435\u0440\u0435\u0432\u044c\u0435\u0432\r\n    mapping(address => uint256) public donorTreeCount;\r\n    \r\n    // \u041e\u0431\u0449\u0430\u044f \u0441\u0442\u0430\u0442\u0438\u0441\u0442\u0438\u043a\u0430\r\n    uint256 public totalTreesPlanted;\r\n    uint256 public totalDonations;\r\n    uint256 public totalRewardsPaid;\r\n    \r\n    // \u0426\u0435\u043d\u044b \u0438 \u043d\u0430\u0433\u0440\u0430\u0434\u044b\r\n    uint256 public constant TREE_PRICE = 0.005 ether;        // \u0426\u0435\u043d\u0430 \u0437\u0430 \u043f\u043e\u0441\u0430\u0434\u043a\u0443 \u043e\u0434\u043d\u043e\u0433\u043e \u0434\u0435\u0440\u0435\u0432\u0430\r\n    uint256 public constant EXECUTOR_REWARD = 0.004 ether;   // \u041d\u0430\u0433\u0440\u0430\u0434\u0430 \u0438\u0441\u043f\u043e\u043b\u043d\u0438\u0442\u0435\u043b\u044e \u0437\u0430 \u043e\u0434\u043d\u043e \u0434\u0435\u0440\u0435\u0432\u043e\r\n    uint256 public constant PLATFORM_FEE = 0.001 ether;      // \u041a\u043e\u043c\u0438\u0441\u0441\u0438\u044f \u043f\u043b\u0430\u0442\u0444\u043e\u0440\u043c\u044b \u0437\u0430 \u043e\u0434\u043d\u043e \u0434\u0435\u0440\u0435\u0432\u043e\r\n\r\n    // ============ EVENTS ============\r\n    \r\n    event TreePurchased(\r\n        uint256 indexed treeId,\r\n        address indexed donor,\r\n        uint256 amount,\r\n        uint256 treeCount,\r\n        string location\r\n    );\r\n    \r\n    event TreePlanted(\r\n        uint256 indexed treeId,\r\n        address indexed executor,\r\n        string imageHash,\r\n        string documentHash\r\n    );\r\n    \r\n    event TreeVerified(\r\n        uint256 indexed treeId,\r\n        address indexed executor,\r\n        uint256 rewardAmount\r\n    );\r\n    \r\n    event FundsWithdrawn(\r\n        address indexed to,\r\n        uint256 amount,\r\n        string purpose\r\n    );\r\n\r\n    // ============ CONSTRUCTOR ============\r\n    \r\n    constructor() ERC721(\"TreeChain NFT\", \"TREE\") Ownable(msg.sender) {}\r\n\r\n    // ============ MODIFIERS ============\r\n    \r\n    modifier onlyVerifiedExecutor() {\r\n        require(executorTreeCount[msg.sender] > 0, \"Not a verified executor\");\r\n        _;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // ============ EXTERNAL FUNCTIONS ============\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u041f\u043e\u043a\u0443\u043f\u043a\u0430 NFT \u0434\u0435\u0440\u0435\u0432\u044c\u0435\u0432 \u0434\u043e\u043d\u043e\u0440\u043e\u043c\r\n     * @param treeCount \u041a\u043e\u043b\u0438\u0447\u0435\u0441\u0442\u0432\u043e \u0434\u0435\u0440\u0435\u0432\u044c\u0435\u0432\r\n     * @param location \u0413\u0435\u043e\u043b\u043e\u043a\u0430\u0446\u0438\u044f \u0434\u043b\u044f \u043f\u043e\u0441\u0430\u0434\u043a\u0438\r\n     */\r\n    function purchaseTree(\r\n        uint256 treeCount,\r\n        string memory location\r\n    ) external payable nonReentrant {\r\n        require(treeCount > 0, \"Tree count must be positive\");\r\n        require(msg.value >= TREE_PRICE * treeCount, \"Insufficient payment\");\r\n        require(bytes(location).length > 0, \"Location cannot be empty\");\r\n        \r\n        _treeIds++;\r\n        uint256 treeId = _treeIds;\r\n        \r\n        // \u0421\u043e\u0437\u0434\u0430\u0435\u043c NFT \u0434\u043b\u044f \u0434\u043e\u043d\u043e\u0440\u0430\r\n        _tokenIds++;\r\n        uint256 tokenId = _tokenIds;\r\n        _mint(msg.sender, tokenId);\r\n        \r\n        // \u0421\u043e\u0437\u0434\u0430\u0435\u043c \u0437\u0430\u043f\u0438\u0441\u044c \u043e \u0434\u0435\u0440\u0435\u0432\u0435\r\n        trees[treeId] = Tree({\r\n            id: treeId,\r\n            treeCount: treeCount,\r\n            location: location,\r\n            imageHash: \"\",\r\n            documentHash: \"\",\r\n            donor: msg.sender,\r\n            executor: address(0),\r\n            donationAmount: msg.value,\r\n            rewardAmount: EXECUTOR_REWARD * treeCount,\r\n            isVerified: false,\r\n            plantedAt: 0,\r\n            verifiedAt: 0\r\n        });\r\n        \r\n        // \u041e\u0431\u043d\u043e\u0432\u043b\u044f\u0435\u043c \u0441\u0442\u0430\u0442\u0438\u0441\u0442\u0438\u043a\u0443\r\n        donorTreeCount[msg.sender] += treeCount;\r\n        totalTreesPlanted += treeCount;\r\n        totalDonations += msg.value;\r\n        \r\n        emit TreePurchased(treeId, msg.sender, msg.value, treeCount, location);\r\n        \r\n        console.log(\"Trees purchased by %s: %s trees for %s ETH\", msg.sender, treeCount, msg.value);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u041f\u043e\u043a\u0443\u043f\u043a\u0430 NFT \u0434\u0435\u0440\u0435\u0432\u044c\u0435\u0432 \u043f\u0440\u0435\u0434\u043f\u0440\u0438\u044f\u0442\u0438\u0435\u043c\r\n     * @param treeCount \u041a\u043e\u043b\u0438\u0447\u0435\u0441\u0442\u0432\u043e \u0434\u0435\u0440\u0435\u0432\u044c\u0435\u0432\r\n     * @param location \u0413\u0435\u043e\u043b\u043e\u043a\u0430\u0446\u0438\u044f \u0434\u043b\u044f \u043f\u043e\u0441\u0430\u0434\u043a\u0438\r\n     * @param enterpriseName \u041d\u0430\u0437\u0432\u0430\u043d\u0438\u0435 \u043f\u0440\u0435\u0434\u043f\u0440\u0438\u044f\u0442\u0438\u044f\r\n     */\r\n    function purchaseTreeAsEnterprise(\r\n        uint256 treeCount,\r\n        string memory location,\r\n        string memory enterpriseName\r\n    ) external payable nonReentrant {\r\n        require(treeCount > 0, \"Tree count must be positive\");\r\n        require(msg.value >= TREE_PRICE * treeCount, \"Insufficient payment\");\r\n        require(bytes(location).length > 0, \"Location cannot be empty\");\r\n        require(bytes(enterpriseName).length > 0, \"Enterprise name cannot be empty\");\r\n        \r\n        _treeIds++;\r\n        uint256 treeId = _treeIds;\r\n        \r\n        // \u0421\u043e\u0437\u0434\u0430\u0435\u043c NFT \u0434\u043b\u044f \u0434\u043e\u043d\u043e\u0440\u0430\r\n        _tokenIds++;\r\n        uint256 tokenId = _tokenIds;\r\n        _mint(msg.sender, tokenId);\r\n        \r\n        // \u0421\u043e\u0437\u0434\u0430\u0435\u043c \u0437\u0430\u043f\u0438\u0441\u044c \u043e \u0434\u0435\u0440\u0435\u0432\u0435\r\n        trees[treeId] = Tree({\r\n            id: treeId,\r\n            treeCount: treeCount,\r\n            location: location,\r\n            imageHash: \"\",\r\n            documentHash: \"\",\r\n            donor: msg.sender,\r\n            executor: address(0),\r\n            donationAmount: msg.value,\r\n            rewardAmount: EXECUTOR_REWARD * treeCount,\r\n            isVerified: false,\r\n            plantedAt: 0,\r\n            verifiedAt: 0\r\n        });\r\n        \r\n        // \u041e\u0431\u043d\u043e\u0432\u043b\u044f\u0435\u043c \u0441\u0442\u0430\u0442\u0438\u0441\u0442\u0438\u043a\u0443\r\n        donorTreeCount[msg.sender] += treeCount;\r\n        totalTreesPlanted += treeCount;\r\n        totalDonations += msg.value;\r\n        \r\n        emit TreePurchased(treeId, msg.sender, msg.value, treeCount, location);\r\n        \r\n        console.log(\"Trees purchased by enterprise %s: %s trees for %s ETH\", enterpriseName, treeCount, msg.value);\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u0418\u0441\u043f\u043e\u043b\u043d\u0438\u0442\u0435\u043b\u044c \u0441\u043e\u043e\u0431\u0449\u0430\u0435\u0442 \u043e \u043f\u043e\u0441\u0430\u0434\u043a\u0435 \u0434\u0435\u0440\u0435\u0432\u0430\r\n     * @param treeId ID \u0434\u0435\u0440\u0435\u0432\u0430\r\n     * @param imageHash IPFS \u0445\u0435\u0448 \u0444\u043e\u0442\u043e\u0433\u0440\u0430\u0444\u0438\u0438\r\n     * @param documentHash IPFS \u0445\u0435\u0448 \u0434\u043e\u043a\u0443\u043c\u0435\u043d\u0442\u043e\u0432\r\n     */\r\n    function plantTree(\r\n        uint256 treeId,\r\n        string memory imageHash,\r\n        string memory documentHash\r\n    ) external {\r\n        require(treeId > 0 && treeId <= _treeIds, \"Invalid tree ID\");\r\n        require(trees[treeId].executor == address(0), \"Tree already assigned\");\r\n        require(bytes(imageHash).length > 0, \"Image hash required\");\r\n        require(bytes(documentHash).length > 0, \"Document hash required\");\r\n        \r\n        trees[treeId].executor = msg.sender;\r\n        trees[treeId].imageHash = imageHash;\r\n        trees[treeId].documentHash = documentHash;\r\n        trees[treeId].plantedAt = block.timestamp;\r\n        \r\n        emit TreePlanted(treeId, msg.sender, imageHash, documentHash);\r\n        \r\n        console.log(\"Tree %s planted by %s\", treeId, msg.sender);\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u0412\u0435\u0440\u0438\u0444\u0438\u043a\u0430\u0446\u0438\u044f \u043f\u043e\u0441\u0430\u0434\u043a\u0438 \u0434\u0435\u0440\u0435\u0432\u0430 (\u0442\u043e\u043b\u044c\u043a\u043e \u0432\u043b\u0430\u0434\u0435\u043b\u0435\u0446)\r\n     * @param treeId ID \u0434\u0435\u0440\u0435\u0432\u0430\r\n     * @param approved \u041e\u0434\u043e\u0431\u0440\u0435\u043d\u0430 \u043b\u0438 \u043f\u043e\u0441\u0430\u0434\u043a\u0430\r\n     */\r\n    function verifyTree(uint256 treeId, bool approved) external {\r\n        require(treeId > 0 && treeId <= _treeIds, \"Invalid tree ID\");\r\n        require(trees[treeId].executor != address(0), \"Tree not planted yet\");\r\n        require(!trees[treeId].isVerified, \"Tree already verified\");\r\n        \r\n        if (approved) {\r\n            trees[treeId].isVerified = true;\r\n            trees[treeId].verifiedAt = block.timestamp;\r\n            \r\n            // \u041d\u0430\u0447\u0438\u0441\u043b\u044f\u0435\u043c \u043d\u0430\u0433\u0440\u0430\u0434\u0443 \u0438\u0441\u043f\u043e\u043b\u043d\u0438\u0442\u0435\u043b\u044e\r\n            address executor = trees[treeId].executor;\r\n            executorTreeCount[executor] += trees[treeId].treeCount;\r\n            totalRewardsPaid += trees[treeId].rewardAmount;\r\n            \r\n            // \u041f\u0435\u0440\u0435\u0432\u043e\u0434\u0438\u043c \u043d\u0430\u0433\u0440\u0430\u0434\u0443 \u0438\u0441\u043f\u043e\u043b\u043d\u0438\u0442\u0435\u043b\u044e\r\n            (bool success, ) = executor.call{value: trees[treeId].rewardAmount}(\"\");\r\n            require(success, \"Reward transfer failed\");\r\n            \r\n            emit TreeVerified(treeId, executor, trees[treeId].rewardAmount);\r\n            \r\n            console.log(\"Tree %s verified, reward %s ETH sent to %s\", \r\n                treeId, trees[treeId].rewardAmount, executor);\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u041f\u043e\u043b\u0443\u0447\u0435\u043d\u0438\u0435 \u0438\u043d\u0444\u043e\u0440\u043c\u0430\u0446\u0438\u0438 \u043e \u0434\u0435\u0440\u0435\u0432\u0435\r\n     * @param treeId ID \u0434\u0435\u0440\u0435\u0432\u0430\r\n     * @return tree \u0414\u0430\u043d\u043d\u044b\u0435 \u0434\u0435\u0440\u0435\u0432\u0430\r\n     */\r\n    function getTree(uint256 treeId) external view returns (Tree memory tree) {\r\n        require(treeId > 0 && treeId <= _treeIds, \"Invalid tree ID\");\r\n        return trees[treeId];\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u041f\u043e\u043b\u0443\u0447\u0435\u043d\u0438\u0435 \u0441\u0442\u0430\u0442\u0438\u0441\u0442\u0438\u043a\u0438 \u043f\u0440\u0435\u0434\u043f\u0440\u0438\u044f\u0442\u0438\u044f\r\n     * @param enterprise \u0410\u0434\u0440\u0435\u0441 \u043f\u0440\u0435\u0434\u043f\u0440\u0438\u044f\u0442\u0438\u044f\r\n     */\r\n    function getEnterpriseStats(address enterprise) external view returns (\r\n        uint256 _donatedTrees,\r\n        uint256 _totalSpent\r\n    ) {\r\n        return (\r\n            donorTreeCount[enterprise],\r\n            donorTreeCount[enterprise] * TREE_PRICE\r\n        );\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u041f\u043e\u043b\u0443\u0447\u0435\u043d\u0438\u0435 \u0441\u0442\u0430\u0442\u0438\u0441\u0442\u0438\u043a\u0438 \u043f\u043b\u0430\u0442\u0444\u043e\u0440\u043c\u044b\r\n     */\r\n    function getPlatformStats() external view returns (\r\n        uint256 _totalTreesPlanted,\r\n        uint256 _totalDonations,\r\n        uint256 _totalRewardsPaid,\r\n        uint256 _availableBalance\r\n    ) {\r\n        return (\r\n            totalTreesPlanted,\r\n            totalDonations,\r\n            totalRewardsPaid,\r\n            address(this).balance\r\n        );\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u041f\u043e\u043b\u0443\u0447\u0435\u043d\u0438\u0435 \u0441\u0442\u0430\u0442\u0438\u0441\u0442\u0438\u043a\u0438 \u043f\u043e\u043b\u044c\u0437\u043e\u0432\u0430\u0442\u0435\u043b\u044f\r\n     * @param user \u0410\u0434\u0440\u0435\u0441 \u043f\u043e\u043b\u044c\u0437\u043e\u0432\u0430\u0442\u0435\u043b\u044f\r\n     */\r\n    function getUserStats(address user) external view returns (\r\n        uint256 _donatedTrees,\r\n        uint256 _plantedTrees\r\n    ) {\r\n        return (\r\n            donorTreeCount[user],\r\n            executorTreeCount[user]\r\n        );\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    // ============ OWNER FUNCTIONS ============\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u0412\u044b\u0432\u043e\u0434 \u0441\u0440\u0435\u0434\u0441\u0442\u0432 \u043f\u043b\u0430\u0442\u0444\u043e\u0440\u043c\u044b\r\n     * @param amount \u0421\u0443\u043c\u043c\u0430 \u0434\u043b\u044f \u0432\u044b\u0432\u043e\u0434\u0430\r\n     * @param purpose \u041d\u0430\u0437\u043d\u0430\u0447\u0435\u043d\u0438\u0435 \u0441\u0440\u0435\u0434\u0441\u0442\u0432\r\n     */\r\n    function withdrawFunds(uint256 amount, string memory purpose) external onlyOwner {\r\n        require(amount <= address(this).balance, \"Insufficient balance\");\r\n        require(amount > 0, \"Amount must be positive\");\r\n        \r\n        (bool success, ) = owner().call{value: amount}(\"\");\r\n        require(success, \"Withdrawal failed\");\r\n        \r\n        emit FundsWithdrawn(owner(), amount, purpose);\r\n        \r\n        console.log(\"Withdrawn %s ETH for: %s\", amount, purpose);\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u042d\u043a\u0441\u0442\u0440\u0435\u043d\u043d\u044b\u0439 \u0432\u044b\u0432\u043e\u0434 \u0432\u0441\u0435\u0445 \u0441\u0440\u0435\u0434\u0441\u0442\u0432\r\n     */\r\n    function emergencyWithdraw() external onlyOwner {\r\n        uint256 balance = address(this).balance;\r\n        (bool success, ) = owner().call{value: balance}(\"\");\r\n        require(success, \"Emergency withdrawal failed\");\r\n        \r\n        emit FundsWithdrawn(owner(), balance, \"Emergency withdrawal\");\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    // ============ OVERRIDES ============\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u041f\u0435\u0440\u0435\u043e\u043f\u0440\u0435\u0434\u0435\u043b\u044f\u0435\u043c tokenURI \u0434\u043b\u044f \u043c\u0435\u0442\u0430\u0434\u0430\u043d\u043d\u044b\u0445 NFT\r\n     */\r\n    function tokenURI(uint256 tokenId) public view override returns (string memory) {\r\n        require(ownerOf(tokenId) != address(0), \"Token does not exist\");\r\n        \r\n        // \u0412 \u0440\u0435\u0430\u043b\u044c\u043d\u043e\u043c \u043f\u0440\u043e\u0435\u043a\u0442\u0435 \u0437\u0434\u0435\u0441\u044c \u0434\u043e\u043b\u0436\u0435\u043d \u0431\u044b\u0442\u044c JSON \u0441 \u043c\u0435\u0442\u0430\u0434\u0430\u043d\u043d\u044b\u043c\u0438\r\n        return string(abi.encodePacked(\r\n            \"https://api.treechain.org/metadata/\",\r\n            _toString(tokenId)\r\n        ));\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    // ============ INTERNAL FUNCTIONS ============\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u041a\u043e\u043d\u0432\u0435\u0440\u0442\u0430\u0446\u0438\u044f uint256 \u0432 string\r\n     */\r\n    function _toString(uint256 value) internal pure returns (string memory) {\r\n        if (value == 0) {\r\n            return \"0\";\r\n        }\r\n        uint256 temp = value;\r\n        uint256 digits;\r\n        while (temp != 0) {\r\n            digits++;\r\n            temp /= 10;\r\n        }\r\n        bytes memory buffer = new bytes(digits);\r\n        while (value != 0) {\r\n            digits -= 1;\r\n            buffer[digits] = bytes1(uint8(48 + uint256(value % 10)));\r\n            value /= 10;\r\n        }\r\n        return string(buffer);\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    // ============ RECEIVE ============\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u041f\u043e\u043b\u0443\u0447\u0435\u043d\u0438\u0435 ETH\r\n     */\r\n    receive() external payable {\r\n        console.log(\"Received %s ETH\", msg.value);\r\n    }\r\n}","keccak256":"0xed54556d7a12e52077c502c2d6ea7766b775c7d887d9e31de713fbd075a5f04f","license":"MIT"},"hardhat/console.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\npragma solidity >=0.4.22 ERC721IncorrectOwner(address,uint256,add.details: Indicates an error related to the ownership over a particular token. Used in transfers.

params.owner: Address of the current owner of a token.
params.sender: Address whose tokens are being transferred.

ERC721InsufficientApproval(address,uint2.details: Indicates a failure with the `operator`s approval. Used in transfers.

params.operator: Address that may be allowed to operate on tokens without being their owner.

ERC721InvalidApprover(address).details: Indicates a failure with the `approver` of a token to be approved. Used in approvals.

ERC721InvalidOperator(address).details: Indicates a failure with the `operator` to be approved. Used in approvals.

params.operator: Address that may be allowed to operate on tokens without being their owner.

ERC721InvalidOwner(address).details: Indicates that an address can't be an owner. For example, `address(0)` is a forbidden owner in ERC-20. Used in balance queries.

params.owner: Address of the current owner of a token.

ERC721InvalidReceiver(address).details: Indicates a failure with the token `receiver`. Used in transfers.

params.receiver: Address to which tokens are being transferred.

ERC721InvalidSender(address).details: Indicates a failure with the token `sender`. Used in transfers.

params.sender: Address whose tokens are being transferred.

ERC721NonexistentToken(uint256).details: Indicates a `tokenId` whose `owner` is the zero address.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

Approval(address,address,uint256).details: Emitted when `owner` enables `approved` to manage the `tokenId` token.

ApprovalForAll(address,address,bool).details: Emitted when `owner` enables or disables (`approved`) `operator` to manage all of its assets.

Transfer(address,address,uint256).details: Emitted when `tokenId` token is transferred from `from` to `to`.

approve(address,uint256).details: Gives permission to `to` to transfer `tokenId` token to another account. The approval is cleared when the token is transferred. Only a single account can be approved at a time, so approving the zero address clears previous approvals. Requirements: - The caller must own the token or be an approved operator. - `tokenId` must exist. Emits an {Approval} event.

balanceOf(address).details: Returns the number of tokens in ``owner``'s account.

getApproved(uint256).details: Returns the account approved for `tokenId` token. Requirements: - `tokenId` must exist.

isApprovedForAll(address,address).details: Returns if the `operator` is allowed to manage all of the assets of `owner`. See {setApprovalForAll}

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

ownerOf(uint256).details: Returns the owner of the `tokenId` token. Requirements: - `tokenId` must exist.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.details: Safely transfers `tokenId` token from `from` to `to`, checking first that contract recipients are aware of the ERC-721 protocol to prevent tokens from being forever locked. Requirements: - `from` cannot be the zero address. - `to` cannot be the zero address. - `tokenId` token must exist and be owned by `from`. - If the caller is not `from`, it must have been allowed to move this token by either {approve} or   {setApprovalForAll}. - If `to` refers to a smart contract, it must implement {IERC721Receiver-onERC721Received}, which is called upon   a safe transfer. Emits a {Transfer} event.

Safely transfers `tokenId` token from `from` to `to`. Requirements: - `from` cannot be the zero address. - `to` cannot be the zero address. - `tokenId` token must exist and be owned by `from`. - If the caller is not `from`, it must be approved to move this token by either {approve} or {setApprovalForAll}. - If `to` refers to a smart contract, it must implement {IERC721Receiver-onERC721Received}, which is called upon   a safe transfer. Emits a {Transfer} event.

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).details: Approve or remove `operator` as an operator for the caller. Operators can call {transferFrom} or {safeTransferFrom} for any token owned by the caller. Requirements: - The `operator` cannot be the address zero. Emits an {ApprovalForAll} event.

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[ERC section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Transfers `tokenId` token from `from` to `to`. WARNING: Note that the caller is responsible to confirm that the recipient is capable of receiving ERC-721 or else they may be permanently lost. Usage of {safeTransferFrom} prevents loss, though the caller must understand this adds an external call which potentially creates a reentrancy vulnerability. Requirements: - `from` cannot be the zero address. - `to` cannot be the zero address. - `tokenId` token must be owned by `from`. - If the caller is not `from`, it must be approved to move this token by either {approve} or {setApprovalForAll}. Emits a {Transfer} event.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
